name: Trials of The Illuminati: Animated Christmas Time Jigsaws
name_original: Trials of The Illuminati: Animated Christmas Time Jigsaws
description:
Twelve different jigsaws in three difficulty levels*2 including:

Presents,
Christmas Trees,
Christmas Environments,
Ornaments,
Jinglebells,
And more!

A calm and relaxing experience with hours of entertainment!
